conversation.content: Um, so I'm... locked out. Again. Er, tried my password and, uh, now it just...
Oh! Right right. So basically. Let me pull that up. Account lockout after, um. Multiple attempts?
Yeah. Three times. That's what you guys always... I mean, um, last time took days to fix, so...
Aha! Um, so like, I see what happened here. Your account ID ACC-7291-NQ just, uh, triggered our security. But wait. This is, um, actually an easy fix.
Sure it is. That's what they said before and then...
No no! So basically, um, I can, er, reset this right now. Like literally. Security code, uh, SRC-44829-V coming to your phone.
Wait, really? You can just... but last time they said—no, actually—
Got it! So, um, check your phone. Should be, er, right there. Code expires in, uh, five minutes though.
Um, okay, I see... wait, it actually, uh, came through? The code is, er, 7-7-9-2?
Perfect! So entering that. And... boom! Account ACC-7291-NQ is, like. Completely unlocked.
I don't—um, that's it? You're not gonna, uh, transfer me or... make me wait?
Nope! So basically, um, all done. Your new temp password is, uh, TEMP-3847-KL. Er, you'll change it when you log in.
This is... I mean, last time was such a...
Yeah so, um, we upgraded our system like, er, two weeks ago. Reference ticket TKT-98234-M shows, uh, much faster now.
Um, wow. Okay. So I just, er, use that temp one and then... that's really it?
That's it! Just, so. Log in. Change password. You're good.
I can't believe... this actually worked? No hold time, no...
Right? So like, um, anything else while I, er, have your account up? Session ID, uh, SES-6621-RT is still active.
Um, no, I'm just... surprised? Like, uh, actually surprised this was, er, this easy.
Hey. Sometimes things just. Work out! Have a great day.
